titles: A true copie of the petition of the knights, iustices of the peace, and other gentlemen, ministers and free-holders (in number many thousands) of the county of Monmouth, exhibited May 17. 1642. To the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses assembled in the house of Commons.
publisher: Printed by order of the petitioners, for William Larnar, at the signe of the Bible in little East-Cheape,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
